attachments.title: Building iPhone and iPad Electronic Projects
attachments.text: Why simply play music or go online when you can use your iPhone or iPad for some really fun projects, such as building a metal detector, hacking a radio control truck, or tracking a model rocket in...
attachments.fallback: Building iPhone and iPad Electronic Projects

text: (I'm told). It also might prove useful for other upcoming electronics projects
